isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - DETROIT DIESEL SERIES 60 ENGINES - OPERATION - ANTILOCK BRAKE INTERFACE

svcproc.title: ANTILOCK BRAKE INTERFACE
svcproc.para: If the vehicle is equipped with antilock brakes, information is shared with ABS controller module (766) over a pink wire, connector (403), and circuit 98Z(+) to the ECM (406). Information is also shared by the ABS module (766) over a light blue wire, connector (403) and circuit 98Y(-) to the ECM (406).
